description:
My years of crafting have given me lots of experience with glues and this All Purpose glue is the best and easiest to use I have ever seen. I also show you my favorite glues that I use for specific crafting applications.

You can pick up the STYROGOO on Amazon: 
https://amzn.to/2OMr3xv
But get a much better deal at the Hot Wire Foam Factory Site
Styrogoo: https://hotwirefoamfactory.com/-028SG--StyroGoo-?bid=14&partner=32240.html

My Favorite Glue Gun:
Surebonder Gluegun: https://amzn.to/2KB1ooa

Surebonder Nozzle Replacements: https://amzn.to/2M3npBG

Surebonder All-Temp Glue Sticks: https://amzn.to/2vu9LwR

The most economical way to bue Glue-All:
Gallon of white glue:  https://amzn.to/2ulniqd

WEBSITE: For more information on DM crafting and to get the tools you need to start or upgrade:
http://www.thedmscraft.com/

THE TABLETOP CRAFTERS GUILD SITE:
http://www.tabletopcraftersguild.com/

PATREON: Become a friend to the Craft and help me bring more content to the community by joining my Patreon. You will have access to exclusive DM Scotty content:  https://www.patreon.com/theDMsCraft?ty=h

FACEBOOK: Join The Tabletop Crafters Guild Facebook group for more crafts and camaraderie. 
https://www.facebook.com/groups/dmscottyscraftsngames/

TWITTER:  @TheDMsCraft

DISCLAIMER: This video and description contains affiliate links, which means that if you click on one of the product links, Iâ€™ll receive a small commission. This helps support the channel and allows DM Scotty to continue to make videos for our community. Thank you for the support and Go Forth and Craft
